      • getBytesFromUri

        public static byte[] getBytesFromUri(Uri uri,
                                     Context context)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the contents of the resource pointed to by the Uri into a byte array.
        Parameters:
        uri - a Uri pointing to a file
        context - Android context
        Returns:
        contents of the Uri
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an issue with the input stream from the Uri
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if null input stream was returned by the Context's Content Resolver

      • isUriInputStreamAvailable

        public static boolean isUriInputStreamAvailable(Uri uri,
                                                Context context)
        Test whether an InputStream can be opened for the Uri.
        Parameters:
        uri - a Uri pointing to a file
        context - Android context
        Returns:
        true if an InputStream can be opened for the Uri

      • getFilenameFromUri

        public static java.lang.String getFilenameFromUri(Uri uri,
                                                  Context context)
        Retrieves the filename of a Uri, if available.
        Parameters:
        uri - a Uri pointing to a file
        context - Android context
        Returns:
        the filename
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the Uri is not pointing to a file or the filename was not available

      • getFileSizeFromUri

        public static int getFileSizeFromUri(Uri uri,
                                     Context context)
        Retrieves the file size of a Uri, if available.
        Parameters:
        uri - a Uri pointing to a file
        context - Android context
        Returns:
        the filename
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the Uri is not pointing to a file or the filename was not available
